data.text: @Malickfan I am looking forward to her in IT Vol 2 though.
@JetToneFan Not seen Mama but I thought she was fun in Crimson Peak

@Malickfan I think she can be terrible, Mama, Crimson Peak (a film I quite like) and a few others, but mostly I don't really think about her. Though, she is great in a few films as well, not least Zero Dark Thirty and Tree of Life.
@Malickfan And Molly's Game, which is more or less Sorkin's documentary about her tits, is certainly a film people are fond of across the internet.
@JetToneFan Actually a film with Tom Hardy by Hillcoat she was bad in
@JetToneFan Although I never thought of her as one note until you just said it, her character in Sloane and Molly are the same.  Not seen her be terrible yet though.
@JetToneFan Yeah, I wasn't talking about her performance I was being a twat.

@Malickfan I am ambivalent on Chastain. When she is good she is great, when she is bad she is terrible. She is excessively one note, and plays almost every character the same. But makes it work 1 out of 3 films, say. Miss Sloane is totally fine.
@JetToneFan I thought it was more about the big reveal at the end than it being an "issue" film.  TBH I think I preferred this to Molly.  Without sounding like a twat Jessica Chastain is amazing 😉😀

The major problem with Miss Sloane is how tedious the subject of American gun ownership is. Americans love to own guns, if they didn't the majority would have them banned. The faux hand-wringing for better checks is unutterably dull.
